GSD.product_version: versions from v4.4 to before v5.10.154
GSD.description:
nfc: fdp: Fix potential memory leak in fdp_nci_send()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.154 by commit e8c11ee2d07f7c4dfa2ac0ea8efc4f627e58ea57, it was introduced in version v4.4 by commit a06347c04c13e380afce0c9816df51f00b83faf1. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: nfc: fdp: Fix potential memory leak in fdp_nci_send()
